channel.title: SAA 2018 Government Digital Data - Rosemarie Blewitt

item.title: Managing Digital Data at the North Carolina Office of State Archaeology: Challenges and Directions
item.description:
Rosemarie Blewitt

The North Carolina Office of State Archaeology (OSA) was created by the North Carolina General Assembly in 1973 to coordinate and implement a statewide archaeological preservation program. Central to this program is the OSA’s management of records, including those documenting the more than 50,000 archaeological sites …
item.dc:creator: Rosemarie Blewitt
